network
Class Overlay

java.lang.Object
  network.Overlay

public class Overlay
extends java.lang.Object

Qantiqa overlay Handles all the request done by peers to other peers and gluons.

Author:
Dario

sendToGluon

public void sendToGluon(com.google.protobuf.Message.Builder builder,
                        AsyncResult<?> result,
                        java.lang.Class<? extends com.google.protobuf.Message> messageClass)
Auxiliary method to send a direct protobuf message to our bootstrap gluon. This registers a handle for the corresponding answer from gluon (kind of client/server interaction over Pastry).

Parameters:
builder -
result - Async result handler
messageClass - Class of the message built by the builder
